verses.name: Genesis 36:32
verses.text: And Bela the son of Beor reigned in Edom: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

verses.name: Genesis 36:33
verses.text: And Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

verses.name: Genesis 36:34
verses.text: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.

verses.name: Genesis 36:35
verses.text: And Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.

verses.name: Genesis 36:36
verses.text: And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

verses.name: Genesis 36:37
verses.text: And Samlah died, and Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
